modName: FR and ENG - Agadez Cross Shield of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
This mod add a standalone knightly Agadez Cross Shield, with a Agadez Cross symbol.
This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.

For the stats, please look at the pictures.
Craft: at forge under steel section.

Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#666666][b][size=5]This mod add a standalone knightly Agadez Cross Shield, with a Agadez Cross symbol.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]For the stats, please look at the pictures.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Craft: at forge under steel section.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Sorry for the ugly Agadez Cross symbol, this is my second - public - retexture mod ever.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]No DLC or no other mods are required.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]I used the modders ressource I've found here:
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?]A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus[/url]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]I'm not sure but this mod - maybe - doesn't work with any other mod who use the HeaterShield.esp or .dds textures - not tested atm.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Since I start in a new job, I've no time to mod/update/play at Skyrim.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Intended for the fellow races: Bosmer, Khajiit, Orc, Redguard, or any other desert-themed races.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Sorry for my bad English.
____________
Thanks, Setvi.

[/size][/b][/color][b][size=5][color=#666666]My others mods:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.

[b][/b][/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/b][/size][/b][color=#666666][b][size=5]

Thanks to my friendÂ PTC001 for is amazing screenshots!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/579662/?]Of Goats and Shield - For Alex

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8267681/?]Thanks to PTC001 again![/url]
[/size][/b][/color][color=#666666][b][size=5][img]http://www.contemporarynomad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/logo.gif[/img]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-2-1444644960.png[/img]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71995-2-1450653222.jpg[/img][/size][/b][/color][/center]
